Protocols/MarcoObject.html#/s:8MarcoKit0.name: isNotEmpty
Protocols/MarcoObject.html#/s:8MarcoKit0.abstract: True if the object is not empty.

Protocols/MarcoObject.html#/s:8MarcoKit0.name: elements
Protocols/MarcoObject.html#/s:8MarcoKit0.abstract: Returns all elements. The new array instance will be created.

Protocols/MarcoObject.html#/s:8MarcoKit0.name: any(predicate:)
Protocols/MarcoObject.html#/s:8MarcoKit0.abstract: Returns true if predicate returns true at least for one element.

Protocols/MarcoNumberLiteral.html#/s:8Ma.name: intValue
Protocols/MarcoNumberLiteral.html#/s:8Ma.abstract: Int value. Check if this value is MarcoIntLiteral to avoid conversion.

Protocols/MarcoNumberLiteral.html#/s:8Ma.name: doubleValue
Protocols/MarcoNumberLiteral.html#/s:8Ma.abstract: Double value. Check if this value is MarcoDoubleLiteral to avoid conversion.

Protocols/MarcoDocument.html#/s:8MarcoKi.name: updateOffsets()
Protocols/MarcoDocument.html#/s:8MarcoKi.abstract: Updates offsets for all child values recursively.

Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: isNotEmpty
Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: True if the array is not empty.

Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: elements
Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Returns all elements. The new array instance will be created.

Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: any(predicate:)
Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Returns true if predicate returns true at least for one element.

Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: first(where:)
Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Returns the first value for which predicate returns true.

Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: firstIndex(where:)
Protocols/MarcoArray.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Returns the first value for which predicate returns true.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: offset
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Element offset in a parent. Call MarcoDocument.updateOffsets() to initialize this property.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: range
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Element range.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: text
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Value text.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asObject
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to an object value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asArray
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to an array value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asStringLiteral
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a string value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asString
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to an string value, and returns the backing String if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asStringOrEmpty
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to an string value, and returns the backing String if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asNumberLiteral
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a number value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asIntLiteral
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a integer value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asDoubleLiteral
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a double value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asInt
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to an integer value, and returns the backing Int if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asIntOrZero
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to an integer value, and returns the backing Int if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asDouble
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a double value, and returns the backing Double if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asDoubleOrZero
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a double value, and returns the backing Double if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asBoolLiteral
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a boolean value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asBool
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a boolean value, and returns the backing Bool if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asBoolOrFalse
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a boolean value, and returns the backing Bool if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asBoolOrTrue
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a boolean value, and returns the backing Bool if the cast was successful.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asNullLiteral
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a null value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: isNull
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: True if this value is a null value.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asColor(useAlpha:)
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a color integer value, and converts it into an NSColor.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: asColor
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Safely casts this value to a color integer value, and converts it into an NSColor.

Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.name: document
Protocols/MarcoValue.html#/s:8MarcoKit0A.abstract: Returns an underlying Marco document, or nil if the current value is not currently attached to a document.
